movie.title: Julia
movie.description_intro: A neo-noir revenge thriller centering on Julia Shames, who after suffering a brutal trauma, falls prey to an unorthodox form of therapy to restore herself.
movie.description_full: A neo-noir revenge thriller centering on Julia Shames, who after suffering a brutal trauma, falls prey to an unorthodox form of therapy to restore herself.

movies.title: Treasure Island
movies.summary: Young Jim Hawkins has an unforgettable encounter with pirate Captain Long John Silver and his murderous mates.
movies.description_full: Young Jim Hawkins has an unforgettable encounter with pirate Captain Long John Silver and his murderous mates.
movies.synopsis: Young Jim Hawkins has an unforgettable encounter with pirate Captain Long John Silver and his murderous mates.

movies.title: Live Free or Die Hard
movies.summary: When someone hacks into the computers at the FBI's Cyber Crime Division; the Director decides to round up all the hackers who could have done this. When he's told that because it's the 4th of July most of their agents are not around so they might have trouble getting people to get the hackers. So he instructs them to get local PD'S to take care of it. And one of the cops they ask is John McClane who is tasked with bringing a hacker named Farrell to the FBI. But as soon as he gets there someone starts shooting at them. McClane manages to get them out but they're still being pursued. And it's just when McClane arrives in Washington that the whole system breaks down and chaos ensues.

movies.title: Don't Grow Up
movies.summary: The story about a group of youths who can't face the thought of growing up because anyone who does becomes a rampaging zombie.
movies.description_full: The story about a group of youths who can't face the thought of growing up because anyone who does becomes a rampaging zombie.
movies.synopsis: The story about a group of youths who can't face the thought of growing up because anyone who does becomes a rampaging zombie.

movies.title: Oblivion
movies.summary: One of the few remaining drone repairmen assigned to Earth, its surface devastated after decades of war with the alien Scavs, discovers a crashed spacecraft with contents that bring into question everything he believed about the war, and may even put the fate of mankind in his hands.
movies.description_full: One of the few remaining drone repairmen assigned to Earth, its surface devastated after decades of war with the alien Scavs, discovers a crashed spacecraft with contents that bring into question everything he believed about the war, and may even put the fate of mankind in his hands.
